ENGLISH: The international community is becoming increasingly concerned about our nuclear programme, and rumours are prevalent that some intend to support a UN resolution to place a nuclear embargo upon us.

The international community is becoming increasingly concerned about our aggressive military behavour, and rumours are prevalent that some intend to support a UN resolution to place a military embargo upon us.
NATO is becoming increasingly concerned about our nuclear programme, and rumours are prevalent that some of its members intend to propose a NATO nuclear embargo upon us.
NATO is becoming increasingly concerned about our agressive military behaviour, and rumours are prevalent that some of its members intend to propose a NATO military embargo upon us.
